thread.title: BRIEF-Athene Holding Announces Pricing Of Secondary Offering Of Common Shares

title: BRIEF-Athene Holding Announces Pricing Of Secondary Offering Of Common Shares
text: March 7, 2018 / 12:25 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Athene Holding Announces Pricing Of Secondary Offering Of Common Shares Reuters Staff March 7 (Reuters) - Athene Holding Ltd: * ATHENE HOLDING LTD. ANNOUNCES THE PRICING OF SECONDARY OFFERING OF COMMON SHARES * ATHENE HOLDING - ‍ PRICING UNDERWRITTEN SECONDARY OFFERING OF 10.3 MILLION CLASS A COMMON SHARES AT $49.70 PER SHARE​ * ATHENE HOLDING LTD - ‍ALL OF CLASS A COMMON SHARES ARE BEING SOLD BY A UNIT OF ABU DHABI INVESTMENT AUTHORITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
